about_the_game: "Step into the dark and treacherous world of Hollowforge. In this gripping demo, you'll descend into the eerie depths of a forgotten dungeon mine, where every shadow hides a threat. Face grotesque, nightmarish creatures lurking in the dark, eager to tear you apart. Will you survive the horrors waiting below, or become just another victim of the mine’s twisted past?"

content_descriptors.notes: "While the demo doesn't include all the content mentioned in the survey, the full game will. Designed for players 18+, the game offers intense, gore-filled action. In the demo, you'll explore a dark and chilling dungeon mine, filled with terrifying monsters eager to make you their next meal."
